select u.uid, u.username, u.profileimgurl, ( select t.name from team t, teammember tm where t.teamid = tm.teamid and tm.uid= u.uid ) teamname, sum(umi.grade + case when umi.passflag='Y' then umi.passgrade else 0 end ) as totalscore from usermission umi, user u where u.uid = umi.uid group by u.uid,u.username,u.profileimgurl
totalscore desc LIMIT #{limit} offset #{offset}
